English: Your Attacks become stronger, apply \nBurning and have a chance to\ncreate fire trails that burn enemies.
On cooldown, meteors fall from the skies, \ndamaging enemies and Burning \nthe ground.
Every few Attack hits, you breathe fire \nthat damages and burns enemies \ninfront of you.
Your dash damages enemies leaves a \npath of fire.
The red dragon fights alongside you, \nBurning enemies with its breath.
